item.title: Episode 1: CSS Semantics with Matt Stauffer
item.itunes:author: Adam Wathan
item.itunes:summary: In our very first episode, Adam talks with Matt Stauffer of Tighten Co about OOCSS, BEM, SMACSS, preprocessors, common architecture pitfalls, and CSS semantics.
